definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to put one's hand to it/to start out on a task/to set out
to put effort into sth/to try really hard
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
based on.../in conformance with../taking as one's main principle
to have one's eyes on (a goal)/having sth in mind/to concentrate
to be strongly attached to/to be dedicated/to cling to

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐立不安了好几个小时，等着裁判们决定获胜者。

sentences.english: A fire burns in the cauldron, as a reminder of the Olympic flame.
sentences.chinese: 火炬塔里燃烧着一团火焰，让人想到奥林匹克圣火。

sentences.english: I screamed in pain as the knife cut the surface layer of my skin.
sentences.chinese: 我的皮肤被割开了，我痛苦的嘶叫着。

sentences.english: This splendid region of mountains and valleys contains many wonderful hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 这个风景英俊山区和上庄储藏着很多温泉。

sentences.english: He came in, holding a cigarette between his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他嘴上叨着香烟走了进来。

sentences.english: The big plaster-walled living room held six framed photographs.
sentences.chinese: 客厅的板墙上挂着六个相框。

sentences.english: Experience is a gift being given.
sentences.chinese: 履历是一份礼品，我们正在被付与着。

sentences.english: The brother and sister quickly ran.
Shepherd's purse green season, and grandmother would have to accompany her mother to pick the fields shepherd's purse.
sentences.chinese: 荠菜青青时节，外婆便要母亲陪着去田野里挑荠菜。

sentences.english: Zhu told a group of us.
sentences.chinese: 朱先生对着我们一群人说到。

sentences.english: He was always excited by his life and busy with where it was going.
sentences.chinese: 他总是为他的生活而兴奋，忙着它要去的地方。

sentences.english: A moving legend was often told around the area of Zhongxian County, Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 在四川忠县一带，则流传着一则感人肺腑的传说。

sentences.english: Captured with black and white film, her photography emulates the style of a cinematographer.
sentences.chinese: 黑白胶片同时也模拟着舞台人生。

sentences.english: Oh Fiona found out she had some money in her pocket.
sentences.chinese: 哦，霏欧纳兜里带了着些钱。

sentences.english: It stands apart with small creatures near its roots.
sentences.chinese: 它站在这里，与树下的小动物保持着距离。

sentences.english: I am sailing against waves and squalls on the rough icy sea.
sentences.chinese: 迎着风浪，冒着沉没的危险，我在冰海中艰难地航行。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to stand up/to get up/also pr. [qi3 lai2]

(after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state/indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4])/indicating completion/(after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment/also pr. [qi3 lai5]
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
